Message:
an orphan begged me
to teach her my dance.

She was an odd girl
with cat ears,

who apparently fell in love
with my dance instantly.

she kept telling me
how cool I was...

But, I couldn’t stand
to hear that.

I’m a coward who keeps
looking away from what
I truly want to do.

Please, don’t look at me
with those sparkling eyes.

All I’ve done is cling on to
this bar and dance for people.
